sel.memory



@property @safe ulong bytes(string value);
Gets the memory in bytes from a string.

Params:
string value a value formatted as "float type"

Returns:
the given value in bytes, or 0 if bad formatting

Example:
assert("100 kB".bytes == 100000);
assert("1000 MB".bytes == "1 GB".bytes);


@property @safe string usage(double mem, bool bin = false);
Formats the given memory with the best unity of measurement.

Params:
double mem the memory to be formatted
bool bin boolean value indicating whether or not to use powers of 2s instead of power of 10s

Returns:
the formatted string

Example:
assert(usage(1024, false) == "1.024 kB");
d(usage(memory));


struct Memory;
Memory stored as bytes and available in various formats.

Example:
assert(Memory(1000).kilobytes == 1);
assert(Memory("1 MB").megabytes != Memory("1 MB").mibibytes);


static @nogc @property @safe Memory max();
Gets the highest value possible (18 EiB).

@nogc @safe this(ulong b);
@nogc @safe this(double b);
Creates a Memory instance giving a certain amount of bytes.

@safe this(string data);
Creates a Memory instance from a formatted string that will be decoded using the bytes function.

@nogc @property @safe double B();
alias Bytes = B;
alias bytes = B;
Gets the memory in bytes.

@property double KB();
alias KiloBytes = KB;
alias kilobytes = KB;
Gets the memory in kilobytes.

@property double KiB();
alias KibiBytes = KiB;
alias kibibytes = KiB;
Gets the memory in kibibytes.

@property double MB();
alias MegaBytes = MB;
alias megabytes = MB;
Gets the memory in megabytes.

@property double MiB();
alias MebiByes = MiB;
alias mebibytes = MiB;
Gets the memory in mebibytes.

@property double GB();
alias GigaBytes = GB;
alias gigabytes = GB;
Gets the memory in gigabytes.

@property double GiB();
alias GibiBytes = GiB;
alias gibibytes = GiB;
Gets the memory in gibibytes.

@property double TB();
alias TeraBytes = TB;
alias terabytes = TB;
Gets the memory in terabytes.

@property double TiB();
alias TibiBytes = TiB;
alias tibibytes = TiB;
Gets the memory in tibibytes.

@property double PB();
alias PetaBytes = PB;
alias petabytes = PB;
Gets the memory in petabytes.

@property double PiB();
alias PibiBytes = PiB;
alias pibibytes = PiB;
Gets the memory in pibibyes.

@property double EB();
alias ExaBytes = EB;
alias exabytes = EB;
Gets the memory in exabytes.

@property double EiB();
alias ExbiBytes = EiB;
alias exbibytes = EiB;
Gets the memory in exbibytes.

bool opCmp(Memory mem);
Compares two Memory instances and check if thay have the value.

Example:
assert(Memory(1000) == mem!"KB"(1));


string toString();
Returns the string formatted as the best option.

See Also:
usage

@nogc @safe Memory mem(string type)(double value) if (type == "B" || type == "KB" || type == "KiB" || type == "MB" || type == "MiB" || type == "GB" || type == "GiB");
Creates a Memory instance from an amount of bytes.

Params:
type the type of memory that will be used for conversion
double value the value to be converted in bytes

Example:
assert(mem!"MB"(1) == mem!"KB"(1000));
